title: Ultra-large dipole moment organic cations derived 3D/2D p–n heterojunction for high-efficiency carbon-based perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4692-4702
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00568F, Paper
Yu Lin, Jiawei Tang, Haocong Yan, Jiaru Lin, Wenran Wang, Shengsen Zhang, Huashang Rao, Zhenxiao Pan, Xinhua Zhong
The organic spacer cation with ultra-large dipole moment results in the formation of p-type 2D perovskites and 3D/2D p–n junctions. The hole transport layer-free carbon-based perovskite solar cells achieve an efficiency of 20.08%.
